name: List public gists for the specified user

params.name: since
params.description: A timestamp in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`. Only gists updated at or after this time are returned.

params.name: per_page
params.description: Results per page (max 100)

params.name: page
params.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

name: List the authenticated user's gists or if called anonymously, this will return all public gists

params.name: since
params.description: A timestamp in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`. Only gists updated at or after this time are returned.

params.name: per_page
params.description: Results per page (max 100)

params.name: page
params.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

name: List all public gists

params.name: since
params.description: A timestamp in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`. Only gists updated at or after this time are returned.

params.name: per_page
params.description: Results per page (max 100)

params.name: page
params.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

description:
List all public gists sorted by most recently updated to least recently updated.

Note: With [pagination](https://developer.github.com/v3/#pagination), you can fetch up to 3000 gists. For example, you can fetch 100 pages with 30 gists per page or 30 pages with 100 gists per page.

params.name: page
params.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

name: Get a specific revision of a gist
Create a gist

params.name: files
params.description: Files that make up this gist.

params.name: description
params.description: A description of the gist.

params.name: public
params.description: Indicates whether the gist is public.

description:
The keys in the `files` object are the `string` filename, and the value is another `object` with a key of `content`, and a value of the file contents. For example:

**Note:** Don't name your files "gistfile" with a numerical suffix. This is the format of the automatic naming scheme that Gist uses internally.

name: Edit a gist

params.name: description
params.description: A description of the gist.

params.name: files
params.description: Files that make up this gist.

params.name: content
params.description: Updated file contents.

params.name: filename
params.description: New name for this file.

description:
The keys in the `files` object are the `string` filename. The value is another `object` with a key of `content` (indicating the new contents), or `filename` (indicating the new filename). For example:

**Note**: All files from the previous version of the gist are carried over by default if not included in the object. Deletes can be performed by including the filename with a `null` object.

params.description: Results per page (max 100)

name: Star a gist
description: Note that you'll need to set `Content-Length` to zero when calling out to this endpoint. For more information, see "[HTTP verbs](https://developer.github.com/v3/#http-verbs)."
